56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Umar:`Umar bin Al-Khattab gave a horse to be ridden in Allah's Cause and then he found it being sold. He intended to purchase it. So, he consulted Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) who said, "Don't buy it and don't take back your gift of charity

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا حَمَلَ عَلَى فَرَسٍ فَرَآهَا تُبَاعُ
chapter.eng-name: If someone gives his horse for Allah's Cause and then he sees it being sold
